title: Mirror Cannon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, BLAST THE FUCKING SHIT OUT OF SOMEONE, immediately dealing an Overkill attack to them right there and then.
- During the night, BLAST THE FUCKING SHIT OUT OF SOMEONE'S HOUSE, immediately dealing an Overkill attack to them and whoever intended on visiting them right there and then.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are visited by someone, you will die. However, you will also shatter on anyone who visits you, dealing an Overkill attack to them.
- If you are jailed, you will immediately die and kill the Jailor.
- It takes one-third the majority of votes to hang you. You will shatter over the last person to vote you in this case, and that will count as the daily hang.
